bio.p: Morenike Oluwatoyin Folayan is a Professor in the Department of Child Dental Health, Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile‚ÄêIfe, Nigeria. Her research work encompasses what she calls community bioethics in addition to her research work on the epidemiology of early childhood caries, and implementation science on the intersect between oral, mental, sexual and reproductive health of adolescents.
